attributes.action: Stop Sir Alex Ferguson or Queiroz using the 4-5-1 Formation in Europe and use our best formation 4-4-2
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Manchester United is an attacking force and thrives on Wingers crossing in balls for two attackers. Wayne Rooney needs to be palying in his best position and not on the wing. United to win the treble 2006-07.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
